title: Moon landing is fake
selftext: My good friend from Delhi who has MBA from abroad shared this and he was serious
comments: lemme guess that abroad is United States of Conspiracy Theories

India did not land on the moon. **ISRO's Vikram Lander** did.

Landing entire country on the moon impossible.
You need and deserve better friends OP.

I just say to such peeps: Ur asbootly ryte saaaar! 
There's no point of arguing  about this in 21st century.
Your friend is trying very hard to be white
